thread.title: BRIEF-Bluedon Information Security to acquire two firms for 1.1 bln yuan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Bluedon Information Security to acquire two firms for 1.1 bln yuan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Bluedon Information Security to acquire two firms for 1.1 bln yuan
text:
Sept 8 Bluedon Information Security Technologies Co Ltd
* Says plans to acquire two companies for 1.1 billion yuan ($172.80 million) via cash and share issue
* Says to raise up to 1.1 billion yuan in private placement to help fund acquisitions
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1UyrXO1
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3657 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
